Headline: No trains between 95th/Dan Ryan and 87th
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th/Dan Ryan and 87th due to police activity.H

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th/Dan Ryan and 87th due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Howard and 87th/Dan Ryan at this time.

Shuttle buses have been requested between 95th/Dan Ryan and 87th in both directions to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include #29 State bus.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
